triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: AutoGen enables applications via multiple agents powered by LLMs as core computational units.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: AutoGen proposes a multi-agent conversation framework where agents interact to accomplish tasks.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: Question answering is one of the example application domains demonstrated with AutoGen.

triples.name: Operations research
triples.relevance: Operations research is listed as an application domain where AutoGen demonstrates effectiveness.

triples.name: Computer programming
triples.relevance: Coding/programming is a key application domain where AutoGen enables LLM agents to solve problems.
